title: Web Share and Open Graph (OG) meta

fields.label: Web Share Text
fields.name: web_share_text
fields.instructions: This text will pre-fill what users say about this content. Limit to the size of a tweet (160 characters). For programs, this field defaults to the Intro field value if blank.

fields.label: Hide Web Share
fields.name: web_share_hide
fields.instructions: Check this option to hide the sharing button on the page. This will not prevent users from being able to the URL using browser native sharing buttons or affect the visibility of OG meta data below.

fields.label: OG Title
fields.name: og_title
fields.instructions: This will display as the first line in social media cards. If blank, the document title will be used by default. For programs, this will default to the Program Title field value.

fields.label: OG Description
fields.name: og_description
fields.instructions: This will display as the second line content in social media cards. If blank, the SEO meta description will be used by default. For programs, this field defaults to the Intro field value.

fields.label: OG Image
fields.name: og_image
fields.instructions: This will display as the preview image in social media posts. Be sure the media item has alt text for screen readers (click "Edit Image" here or in the Media Library to modify the alt text). The recommended image dimensions are 1200 Ã— 628 pixels.

fields.label: Resources
fields.message: MetaTags.io | Edit and experiment with your content then preview how your webpage will look on Google, Facebook, Twitter and more. This tool can help test out writing content and designing images, illustrating how it will display across platforms. Open Graph .XYZ; Preview and Generate Open Graph Meta | This tool can help preview how meta tags look to each platform in a live site. Working NYC / Patterns / OG Image Templates | Figma file for OG Image Templates. The file also includes all Working NYC patterns for the creation of new assets. Facebook OG Debugger | This tool can help debug issues with the display of cards on Facebook. Twitter Card Validator | This tool can help debug issues with the display of Twitter Cards.
